title: Cody Simpson jokes he and girlfriend Miley Cyrus would have 'cute kids'
text:
They've only been together for a matter of weeks, but Cody Simpson is already discussing the prospect of having children with his new girlfriend, Miley Cyrus.

In an interview with KIIS FM's Kyle And Jackie O show on Tuesday, following his win on The Masked Singer Australia, he joked that he and Miley, 25, would 'make some cute kids.'

However, the blonde-haired crooner admitted that the pair are not quite ready for such a big step.

The Pretty Brown Eyes hitmaker was asked by Kyle Sandilands if he and the former Disney star had gone as far as thinking of having children together and what he think they would look like.

Kyle and Jackie said the couple's children would be 'beautiful' and and the 'best looking kids'.

But Cody jokingly quipped their kids would probably look: 'Aryan as hell.'

'We'd make some cute kids!' Cody Simpson, 22, has discussed having children with his new girlfriend Miley Cyrus, 25, after just a few weeks of dating

The shock jock went on to ask if they had thought about having a family, but the Paradise favourite said it was 'too early' for them.

'No, it's too early for that, but we'd make some cute kids,' he said.

'I'm 22, I'm ten years away from that, I hope - unless some s**t happens though.'

'I'm ten years away from that': The shock jock went on to ask if they had thought about starting a family, but the Paradise hitmaker said it was 'too early' for them

Meanwhile, Cody was revealed as The Robot on The Masked Singer Australia on Monday night.

He took out the winner's title after wowing audiences and the judges with his rendition of The Edge of Glory by Lady Gaga.

When Cody emerged from the costume, Lindsay Lohan, who was pals with the Aussie star after he dated her younger sister Ali, cried out in astonishment because, for once, she got it right.
description: Cody Simpson, 22, has been busy on the press rounds after winning the Masked Singer Australia.
authors: Alisha Buaya For Daily Mail Australia
